headline: Podcast: Are Stablecoins the Future of Payments?
summary: Dan Dolev, a senior financial-technology analyst at investment firm Mizuho Americas, joins WSJ’s Take On the Week to explore the burgeoning world of stablecoins. Dolev offers insights into Circle Internet Group’s revenue streams, whether stablecoins can disrupt Visa and Mastercard’s payment network and their broader implications for international money transfers.

headline: Fed to cut rates next month as tariffs give prices one-time spur: survey
summary: A handful of Fed officials have voiced optimism since July that the highest U.S. tariffs since the 1930s will stoke just short-term price pressures.

raw.headline: Fed to cut rates next month as tariffs give prices one-time spur: survey

headline: Barclays Raised the Firm’s PT on Visa Inc (V), Kept an Overweight Rating
summary: Visa Inc. (NYSE:V) is one of the Good Stocks to Invest in Now. On June 30, Barclays analyst Ramsey El-Assal raised the firm’s price target on Visa Inc. (NYSE:V) from $396 to $408, while keeping an overweight rating on the stock. The firm upgraded its financial model for the company following its fiscal third-quarter earnings. […]

headline: Latest News In Digital Payment - Digital Banks Reshape Landscape With Super Apps and Innovation
summary: The landscape of digital payments is undergoing significant transformation, fueled by the strategic evolution of digital banks in both retail and SME sectors. These digital challengers have capitalized on underserved consumer needs, reshaping traditional banking models in the process. As they have started achieving profitability, some digital banks are now exploring the potential of super apps and expanding into non-financial service verticals to maintain their growth. This movement signals a...

headline: Truist Slashes PT on Visa Inc. (V) to $392 From $397, Keeps a Buy Rating
summary: Visa Inc. (NYSE:V) is one of the top most profitable NYSE stocks to buy now. Truist analyst Matthew Coad lowered the firm’s price target on Visa Inc.
